cipher_text:
Encode the following text to a Caesar cipher. The shift is 12.
plain text: εκτιμήστε τις μικρές στιγμές της ζωής μας
The Caesar cipher is a type of substitution cipher in which each letter in the plaintext is 'shifted' a certain number of places down the alphabet. In this case, the shift is 12.
To encrypt the given Greek text using a Caesar cipher with a shift of 12, we need to shift each letter 12 places down the Greek alphabet.
ε -> π
κ -> ω
τ -> η
ι -> σ
μ -> χ
ι – > σ
κ – > ω
ρ – > υ
έ – > ί
ς – > φ
τ – > η
η – > λ
ς – > φ
μ – > χ
α – > η
ς – > φ
μ – > χ
α – > η
ς – > φ
So the encrypted text is:
πωηστπ ωμικρες στιγμες της ζωης μας φχχφχ χηηηη ηηηηη ηηηηη ηηηηη

cipher_text:
Encode the following text to a Caesar cipher. The shift is 12.
plain text: κάθε σύννεφο έχει μια ασημένια επένδυση
The Caesar cipher is a type of substitution cipher in which each letter in the plaintext is 'shifted' a certain number of places down the alphabet. In this case, the shift is 12.
To encrypt the given plaintext using a Caesar cipher with a shift of 12, we need to shift each letter 12 places down the alphabet. The Greek alphabet has 24 letters, so we can simply subtract 12 from the position of each letter to get the corresponding ciphertext letter.
plain text: κάθε σύννεφο έχει μια ασημένια επένδυση
ciphertext: πβδι τζοννεφο ζδγι μια ιγμμενια κδιενδυση
So, the Caesar cipher for the given plaintext with a shift of 12 is "πβδι τζοννεφο ζδγι μια ιγμμενια κδιενδυση".

cipher_text:
Encode the following text to a Caesar cipher. The shift is 12.
plain text: η καλοσύνη δεν κοστίζει τίποτα
The Caesar cipher is a type of substitution cipher in which each letter in the plaintext is 'shifted' a certain number of places down the alphabet. In this case, the shift is 12.
To encrypt the given Greek text using a Caesar cipher with a shift of 12, we need to shift each letter 12 places down the Greek alphabet.
η -> π
καλοσύνη -> ρμντιώνη
δεν -> πσ
κοστίζει -> μνανται
τίποτα -> σλαντα
So the encrypted text is: πρμντιώνη πσ μνανται σλαντα
